title: Defeat Mystic Carrion
content: ar of Mystic Carrion's Lungs is on a table in the Mortuary.) From the Undercity Ruins waypoint and head west to the Passageway. Enter the Ancient Lair and lockpick the door with a DC 20 Sleight of Hand check. Looting or lockpicking will trigger a fight with a lot of undead. Jar of Mystic Carrion's Brain is on a table. Jar of Mystic Carrion's Liver is in a Guilded Chest to the left of it. Read the book called "Funerary Jar Form and Function" in this room. It gives you the clue for Jar of the hear
